channel.title: [delta] Pickup Restrictions (rep++)
channel.description:
How do I make certain items unspawnable?
emaple: ::pickup 8002 1 [you cannot spawn this item]
Any ideas???? :confused:

item.title: [delta] Pickup Restrictions (rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Mayhem2 Mayhem,
item.description:
@Mayhem2 wrote:

Made one myself, easier then I expected.

Read full topic

item.title: [delta] Pickup Restrictions (rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

hehe, I did it

[code=java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) || playerCommand.startsWith(“pickup”)) {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
int cantSpawnItems[] = {4151, 4152};
if (c.inWild()) {
c.sendMessage(“You can’t spawn items in the Wilderness!”);
return;
}
for (int i : cantSpawnItems) {
if( i == newItemID){
c.sendMessage("This item cannot be spawned ");
return;
}
}
if (args.length == 3 && c.playerRights >= 2) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);

					   }											   
                       } [/code]

Dont say I leached cus I actual figured it out… Was bugging me

Read full topic

Ints, with loops sumthing like this.

then a loop such as

for (int element: nonpickup){ }

then replace this

with this

so now your pickup command should look like

if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup") && itemId.equalsIgnoreCase!(element)) { for(int element : nonpickuo){ //what handles the pickup }

  2. doesnt work

The server doesn’t know what “nonpickup” means, so stop acting like you are a java god because you know the easiest part of java.[/quote]

item.title: [delta] Pickup Restrictions (rep++)
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

You have your command.

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); }
Something like this. Now, before the first } else { add another time } else { and beneath that add if(itemID == #### || itemID == ####){ sM("This item is unspawnable."); }

Read full topic

item.title: [delta] Pickup Restrictions (rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

Sorry, I’m used to Hyperion.

[code=java]

private int restricted[] = { 4151, 4153 };

if(command.startsWith(“pickup”) {
int id = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int amount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
for(int element : restricted) {
if(id == element)
return;
}
c.addItem(id, amount);
} [/code]

Read full topic
